TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit RelationshipManager extends System.Object

summary.span: Used to track relationships between objects in the object context.

span.span: Used to track relationships between objects in the object context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是用來追蹤物件內容中物件之間的關聯性。 is used to track relationships between objects in an object context. 在物件內容中追蹤的每個關聯性都有一個 類別 (Class) 的執行個體 (Instance)。There is one instance of the class for each relationship tracked in the object context. 關聯性定義概念模型中的關聯。Relationships are defined by associations in a conceptual model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Association 項目 (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41)。For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41). ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會將新`SalesOrderHeader`實體`Contact`實體。The example adds new `SalesOrderHeader` entities to the `Contact` entity. 然後它會取得所有相關的端從`Contact`實體，並顯示每個相關端的關聯性名稱、 來源角色名稱和目標角色名稱。Then it gets all related ends from the `Contact` entity and displays the relationship name, source role name, and target role name for each related end. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#irelatedend)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#irelatedend)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作 的物件會使用 方法。The method is used by objects that implement . 當物件服務要求實作 之物件的 屬性時，如果此物件的關聯性管理員尚未存在，就會呼叫 方法。When Object Services requests the property of an object that implements , the method is called if the relationship manager does not already exist for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法傳回的列舉和物件。The method returns an enumeration of and objects. 和是具象型別衍生自。 and are concrete types that derive from . 抽象類別會實作介面。The abstract class implements the interface. ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會將新`SalesOrderHeader`實體`Contact`實體。The example adds new `SalesOrderHeader` entities to the `Contact` entity. 然後它會取得所有相關的端從`Contact`實體和顯示關聯性名稱、 來源角色名稱，以及每個相關端，目標角色名稱Then it gets all related ends from the `Contact` entity and displays relationship name, source role name, and target role name for each related end, [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#irelatedend)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#irelatedend)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得具有指定之關聯性名稱和目標角色名稱的相關物件的 。Gets an of related objects that have the specified relationship name and target role name. 此關聯性名稱不應該符合命名空間。The relationship name should not be namespace qualified. 當您在關聯性名稱前面加上命名空間時，就會發生錯誤。An error occurs when you prepend the namespace to the relationship name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是要在使用者沒有完整中繼資料 (包括關聯性兩端的靜態型別資訊 (Static Type Information)) 的狀況中使用。This method is intended to be used in scenarios where the user does not have full metadata, including the static type information for both ends of the relationship. 這項中繼資料會在關聯性中每個實體類型的 物件中指定，所以中繼資料系統可以根據提供的關聯性名稱和目標角色名稱來擷取這項資料。This metadata is specified in the object on each entity type in the relationship, so the metadata system can retrieve it based on the supplied relationship name and target role name. 此關聯性名稱不應該符合命名空間。The relationship name should not be namespace qualified. 當您在關聯性名稱前面加上命名空間時，就會發生錯誤。An error occurs when you prepend the namespace to the relationship name.

span.span: The source type does not match the type of the owner.

summary.span: Called by Object Services to prepare an for binary serialization with a serialized relationship.

span.span: Called by Object Services to prepare an for binary serialization with a serialized relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 關聯性的序列化僅支援二進位序列化。Serialization of relationships is only supported for binary serialization. 完整的物件圖形 (包括關聯性) 不支援 Windows Communication Foundation 和 XML 序列化。Complete object graphs, including relationships, is not supported for Windows Communication Foundation and XML serialization. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[序列化物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/06c77f9b-5b2e-4c78-b3e3-8c148ba0ea99)。For more information, see [Serializing Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/06c77f9b-5b2e-4c78-b3e3-8c148ba0ea99).
